entry.title: tinyclues hires!!!
entry.summary:
Mission: write beautiful code that is safe, runs fast, and is a pleasure to use. (Our current setup is mostly based on Python).
Must have:
- very solid skills in either Python or Ruby (or outstanding skills in Java, C++ or Brainfuck) - taste for modular solutions and short development cycles - robust practice of TDD and continuous integration, or the strong desire to learn them - self-motivation, and the ability to work in informal and relaxed environments - intellectual curiosity
Nice to have (but far from indispensable):
- experience in effectively playing with big data - experience in data visualization - some knowledge and experience with AWS - some knowledge of either Haskell, Clojure or OCaml
We are looking for both experienced and more junior profiles.
